docs.snippet: The largest educational group ever to visit the United States from South America will arrive here tomorrow on the Grace liner Santa Lucia. There are eighty-one professors and students from Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Colombia in the group, which will...
docs.lead_paragraph: The largest educational group ever to visit the United States from South America will arrive here tomorrow on the Grace liner Santa Lucia. There are eighty-one professors and students from Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Colombia in the group, which will land from the liner early in the morning and go to City Hall, where they are to be welcomed by Mayor La Guardia.

headline.main: SOUTH AMERICANS DUE HERE TO STUDY; Largest Group Sponsored by Exchange System Will Arrive Tomorrow MAYOR WILL GREET PARTY 81 From Ecuador, Peru, Chile and Colombia Will Attend North Carolina 6 Weeks

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 13 (AP) -- The 8,000-ton French freighter Mendoza was reported steaming back to Montevideo tonight from an apparently frustrated second attempt to run home through the British Atlantic blockade.

docs.snippet: Plans for an "industrial exploration" in which industrial research and banking executives will tour South America to investigate its potentialities as "the biggest industrial prize in the world," were announced here yesterday by Maurice Holland,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Plans for an "industrial exploration" in which industrial research and banking executives will tour South America to investigate its potentialities as "the biggest industrial prize in the world," were announced here yesterday by Maurice Holland, director of the National Research Council's division of engineering and industrial research, which is sponsoring the tour.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 15 -- British aerial scouts from an unidentified warship joined the British auxiliary cruiser Asturias tonight on sentry patrol to forestall the French freighter Mendoza's efforts to run home through the British blockade...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 15 -- British aerial scouts from an unidentified warship joined the British auxiliary cruiser Asturias tonight on sentry patrol to forestall the French freighter Mendoza's efforts to run home through the British blockade with sorely needed food.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 14 -- The French steamship Mendoza is anchored off Punta del Este tonight with the British auxiliary cruiser Asturias standing guard on the horizon while Uruguay is preparing to protest to London, charging that detention of...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 14 -- The French steamship Mendoza is anchored off Punta del Este tonight with the British auxiliary cruiser Asturias standing guard on the horizon while Uruguay is preparing to protest to London, charging that detention of the Mendoza Monday was a violation of Uruguayan sovereignty.
docs.abstract: Uruguay protests to London, charging detention of Mendoza was violation of her sovereignty; Vichy reptd to be negotiating with London for navicert; 3 Brit fliers in plane from Brit warship, aiding in sentry duty, held by Montevideo after forced landing on Maldona Bay
